title: His son was kidnapped as a toddler 24 years ago. DNA testing just found him.
content:
1. His son was kidnapped as a toddler 24 years ago. DNA testing just found him.  USA TODAY
  2. This family's 24-year search for their abducted son inspired a movie. They've just been reunited  CNN
  3. Chinese man whose 24-year motorbike search inspired Andy Lau film reunited with abducted son  South China Morning Post
  4. Dad Who Never Gave Up Hope Finds Abducted Son After 24 Years  The Daily Beast
  5. Father reunited with son snatched as baby 24 years ago in China - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 彼の息子は24年前、幼児の時に誘拐されました。DNA検査で発見されました。
24年前，他的儿子在蹒跚学步时被绑架。DNA测试刚刚找到他。
24年前，他的兒子在蹣跚學步時被綁架。DNA測試剛剛找到他。
